Māori Language Week: 28 posters of poems and proverbs create a Te Reo Māori wall of inspiration https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/maori-language-week-posters-create-a-te-reo-maori-wall-of-inspiration/572YV5TDW5EOXLUMEUAG2RZNVY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/maori-language-week-posters-create-a-te-reo-maori-wall-of-inspiration/572YV5TDW5EOXLUMEUAG2RZNVY/ 28 Posters in Lorne Street with stay on display for another week.Thu, 19 Sep 2024 20:00:00 +0000 Visitors can scan the QR code on the side of two steel pourama (light columns) on the corner of Sale St and Wellesley St and hear a poem by Hone Tuwhare.
